channel.title: [PI] Loyalty Title Overwriting Error Problem please help
channel.description:
Hey m8's
when my players log in and they have lets say
title 118 or case 118 in my loyalty titles string and then they log off it auto saves it to title 2
so when they log back in they have title 2
how do i stop this from hapening?
thanks m8's
here's my playersave.java, if u need any other files, post and tell me what.
http://pastebin.com/AhANzrb7
